name: Astrid Nordin
text: I was starving when I came home to see this on my kitchen table.  When I first saw the pizza, I thought someone had brought Zachary's.  In comparison, the extra ricotta adds extra cheesiness and a creamier texture.  I love the chunky ‚Ä¶More

name: Shawn Smith
text: I absolutely enjoy Blaze pizza.. fast friendly and the female manager is amazingly gorgeous..

name: Des Pa
text: I love that you can make your own pizza and there are so many choices including unique toppings. Prices are on the higher side but it's because they offer more than what other pizza shops offer.

name: Neal Benson
text:
Went to Blaze during the order to stay home. The staff was super friendly. We called our order in and it was ready right when we got there.
Really enjoyed our pizza! You can choose pretty much any topping you want.
My daughter ordered a vegan pizza and she loved it. It comes with vegan cheese.

name: Adam Matthews
text: It was my first time there. 5 stars if the pizza was cooked all the way through. The cheese wasn't melted all the way. Other than that I loved everything else, especially the roasted broccoli. Definitely will be back to try different combinations. I see a 5 star rating in the future!

name: Kaley Garcia

name: Lori Jones
text: Polite and helpful service with a variety of good fresh toppings. I like the choices of crust!

name: chris Bailey
text: Easy to find location. Made to order pizza. Very courteous staff. Everyone was wearing PPE so I felt very safe. Thanks for the great, custom pizza

text: My experience here was great. I ordered a personal pizza with many veggies and no meat. Every slice tasted amazing. The service was indeed fast and the employees were smiling - giving off a friendly vibe. ‚Ä¶More
